response.overview: This movie is a freeze frame animated short film co created by a family of three during their quarantine period in Beijing. All the characters and props in the film are handmade by their daughter and modified with toys. The father is responsible for writing, post production, and arrangement, while the mother is a music producer with full photography and lighting assistance. The shooting and production took three weeks, and the equipment used was a household digital camera. Shooting ultra slow lenses required strong light, and the final solution was to use a bathroom heater and two strong light flashlights.
